author: raz
title: Sustainability Hub for Japan
description: Story sharing from impactful projects representing the Japanese community, bridged into other languages is lacking in the Cardano ecosystem.
solution: Facilitating the sharing of sustainable projects + stories from the Japanese community and diaspora, within + external to Cardano.
experience: Economics, Sustainability, Humanities, Social Sciences, NGO's, Social Entrepreneurs, Writers, Blogging, Video Editing, Figma, Canva, AdobeCC
